Disadvantages of Large Institutions 

     "Break up the large centers," has been the word of the Lord. "Carry the light to many places." Those who are desirous of receiving a training for effective medical missionary work should understand that large sanitariums will be conducted so much like institutions of the world that students laboring in such 
                                                                           159
sanitariums cannot obtain a symmetrical training for Christian medical missionary work.
